CHAT.comment: CHRISTOPHER ARTUZ, SUPERINTENDENT, GREEN HAVEN CORRECTIONAL FACILITY, Petitioner v. TONY BRUCE BENNETT
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:55 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN M. CASTELLANO ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAN SCHWEITZER ON BEHALF OF FLORIDA, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ALAN S. FUTERFAS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN M. CASTELLANO ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:52 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
